column4: I've got a laptop with an express card slot, it has a dummy card in it without an eject button and I can't seem to pry it out. anyone experienced this issue? the manual tells me to "Press the ExpressCard eject button to partially extend it out of the computer." but there's no such button
push the dummy card in further, it has like a hmm release... spring...
err, so how do I tell if my Ubuntu world is 32-bit or 64-bit?
I tried, but I don't think I can actually see the dummy card, just some strip of strong plastic covering it
